/apps/installed/ignore.formatZH: 忽略应用 [installId] 版本升级

/apps/installed/sync.formatEN: Sync the list of installed apps

/core/settings/bind/update.formatEN: update system bind info => ipv6: [ipv6], 监听 IP: [bindAddress]
/core/settings/bind/update.formatZH: 修改系统监听信息 => ipv6: [ipv6], 监听 IP: [bindAddress]

/cronjobs/status.formatEN: change the status of cronjob [name] to [status].
/cronjobs/status.formatZH: 修改计划任务 [name] 状态为 [status]

/databases/bind.formatZH: 绑定 mysql 数据库名 [database] [username]

/databases/change/access.formatZH: 更新数据库 [name] 访问权限

/databases/common/update/conf.formatZH: 更新 [type] 数据库 [database] 配置信息

/databases/db/check.formatZH: 检测远程数据库 [name][type] 连接性

/databases/description/update.formatEN: The description of the mysql database [name] is modified => [description]
/databases/description/update.formatZH: mysql 数据库 [name] 描述信息修改 [description]

/databases/pg/bind.formatZH: 绑定 postgresql 数据库 [name] 用户 [username]

/databases/pg/description.formatEN: The description of the postgresql database [name] is modified => [description]
/databases/pg/description.formatZH: postgresql 数据库 [name] 描述信息修改 [description]

/databases/pg/privileges.formatZH: 更新数据库 [database] 用户 [username] 权限

/databases/redis/conf/update.formatEN: update the redis database configuration information
/databases/redis/conf/update.formatZH: 更新 redis 数据库配置信息

/databases/redis/password.formatEN: change the password of the redis database
/databases/redis/password.formatZH: 修改 redis 数据库密码

/databases/redis/persistence/update.formatZH: redis 数据库持久化配置更新

/databases/variables/update.formatZH: 调整 mysql 数据库性能参数

/files/batch/role.formatEN: Batch change file mode and owner [paths] => [mode]/[user]/[group]
/files/batch/role.formatZH: 批量修改文件权限和用户/组 [paths] => [mode]/[user]/[group]

/host/conffile/update.formatZH: 修改 SSH 配置文件

/hosts/command/redis.formatZH: 保存 redis 快捷命令 [name][command]

/hosts/command/redis/del.formatZH: 删除 redis 快捷命令 [names]

/openresty/clear.formatZH: 清理 Openresty 代理缓存

/settings/snapshot/description/update.formatEN: The description of the snapshot [name] is modified => [description]
/settings/snapshot/description/update.formatZH: 快照 [name] 描述信息修改 [description]

/toolbox/clam/status/update.formatEN: change the status of clam [name] to [status].
/toolbox/clam/status/update.formatZH: 修改扫描规则 [name] 状态为 [status]

/websites/:id/https.formatZH: 更新网站 [domain] https 配置

/websites/ca/download.formatZH: 下载 CA 证书文件 [name]

/websites/dir/permission.formatZH: 更新网站 [domain] 目录权限

/websites/proxies/update.formatZH: 修改网站 [domain] 反向代理配置

/websites/redirect/update.formatZH: 修改网站 [domain] 重定向理配置
